casebody.data:
In re Eula ENGLISH. No. 250P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2007. Carl Wright, High Point, Guardian ad Litem, for Heirs of Eula English. Christopher C. Finan, High Point, for Household Realty Corp.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of May 2007 by Petitioner (Jacqueline Acey) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of May 2007."
